          <title>
            <string language="en">Series circuits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Serie Stromkreise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuits de série</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuitos da série</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circuiti di serie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυκλώματα σειράς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circuitos de la serie</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows an actual set-up and the circuit diagram of a lamp and a battery connected in series and their corresponding circuit diagram showing the current flow.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lamps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit diagrams</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">series circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt eine tatsächliche 
Installation und der Schaltplan, einer Lampe und der Batterie, die in 
der Serie angeschlossen werden und ihres entsprechenden Schaltplans, 
der den aktuellen Fluß zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre une installation réelle et 
le schéma de circuit d'une lampe et d'une batterie reliés en série 
et de leur schéma de circuit correspondant montrant l'écoulement 
actuel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra uma instalação real e o 
diagrama de circuito de uma lâmpada e de uma bateria conectados em 
série e de seu diagrama de circuito correspondente que mostra o fluxo
atual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra una messa a punto reale e lo
schema circuitale di una lampada e di una batteria collegati in serie 
e del loro schema circuitale corrispondente che mostra il flusso 
corrente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει μια πραγματική οργάνωση 
και το διάγραμμα κυκλωμάτων ενός λαμπτήρα και μιας μπαταρίας που 
συνδέονται στη σειρά και αντίστοιχο διάγραμμα κυκλωμάτων τους που
εμφανίζει παρούσα ροή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra una disposición real y el 
esquema circular de una lámpara y de una batería conectados en serie
y de su esquema circular correspondiente que muestra el flujo actual.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
